# Do not edit this file! It has been generated by the
# libs/create_module_skeleton.py script.

include(Einsums_Message)

# cmake-format: off
set(_Einsums_modules
    Assertion
    BLAS
    BLASBase
    BLASVendor
    Backtrace
    Benchmark
    Concepts
    Config
    Debugging
    Errors
    Graph
    HPTT
    ITTNotify
    Iterator
    LinearAlgebra
    Memory
    Preprocessor
    Print
    Profile
    StringUtil
    Tensor
    TensorAlgebra
    TensorBase
    TensorUtilities
    TypeSupport
    Utilities
)

if(EINSUMS_WITH_GPU_SUPPORT)
  list(APPEND _Einsums_modules GPUStreams)
endif()
# cmake-format: on

einsums_info("")
einsums_info("  Configuring Einsums modules:")

foreach(module ${_Einsums_modules})
  add_subdirectory(${module})
endforeach()
